title: DJ Sona copied DJ Rhapsody from HoN

embed.description: This one is amazing. I'm going to do another video with her, and make sure i get all the sounds in it. This one is missing 1-2 ability sounds.. I'm definitely not pleased about that.

body: League should give credit to HoN.

replies.body:
>Thinking anything is original in todays day and age
>Lmao

By that logic:
- Twisted Fate copied Gambit
- Volibear copied Iorek Byrnison
- Zac copied Goop
- Fiddlesticks copied the Scarecrow
- Lissandra copied the Snow Queen
- Maokai copied the apple trees from the wizard of oz
- Pantheon copied Leonidas
- Shaco copied Joker
- Veigar copied a jawa
- Warwick copied the big bad wolf
- Zyra copied Poison Ivy
- Zilean copied The Doctor

sona can't "talk" though she use telepathy so different right there

plus dj sona looks way better

Vastly different skins.
If two characters share a similar theme of having to do with music though, it makes sense for them to both have a skin based off one of the most popular music genres today. If that character got a metal theme, I wouldn't say they are copying Pentakill Sona. 
Similar theme? Check. Similar skin? Lol, not at all.
And you copied someone else by using the English language, everything is inspired off of something already created somehow or another... deal with it lol.

So a champion/hero's skin concept is based on techno music is instantly a copy cat of something that borrowed the same theme, let alone the fact that HoN LITERALLY copied and reskined the whole game of original Dota (but I ain't gonna go too deep into this).

This logic is just too much.

Hey I have an idea, why don't we just have Guitar Hero to sue everybody else that has a any reference to music? Isn't that genius????

Sona's appearance and theme was made with a loose reference on the vocaloid, Hatsune Miku, it's only natural that she gets a DJ skin.

No idea what HoN is and that skin is horrible looking! This skin has nothing on DJ Sona and is nothing alike really. 

/shudder at that HoN skin
